column1: COVID-19 has changed how we must operate and this legislation will produce the innovations we need to fight back against the Coronavirus. Let’s get America traveling safely again. https://t.co/tVxC7BImRS

Our local hospitals are the frontline of the fight against Coronavirus and I am proud to have worked with @DepSecHargan to ensure our South Jersey hospitals have more of the resources they need. I promised them that. https://t.co/knUq2yXDx5

Last month I signed onto the Postal Preservation Act(HR 7015). The bill provides for funding and ensures our Postal Service survives thrives and is protected during the Coronavirus pandemic and beyond. We must protect the USPS and all of the hard-working people they serve. https://t.co/TGFFZelPAD
Our small businesses those in healthcare and the sick should be the only priority of legislation regarding Coronavirus. https://t.co/A7q3IuyXMM

South Jersey now has several Coronavirus testing sites. These locations are for residents of the counties by appointment and having met certain criteria for testing. We will keep you posted as additional sites open. https://t.co/QVMv86Wa1X
I joined @foxandfriends yesterday morning to discuss New Jersey and Coronavirus response.  https://t.co/DWv41wt1eM

Hydroxychloroquine and Azithromycin have shown anecdotal evidence that they if used early enough have success in combatting the scourge of COVID-19. I support the usage of these drugs under the correct medical supervision to combat this virus.

Our office is open and stands ready to assist.Please feel free to give us a call at (202)225-6572 email us at info.vandrew@mail.house.gov or visit our website at the link below.We have included some important information regarding the Coronavirus pandemic https://t.co/feoAM9ZCWr
If you’re off work due to COVID-19 in NJ these benefits are available https://t.co/Kek4zpdS5m @nj1015
The @NJLaborDept has some important information on Benefits and the Coronavirus. https://t.co/InUQzpmqcr

Today Congressman Van Drew announced he will be sponsoring H.R. 6194 a bill that will ensure veterans have access to their GI Bill benefits they earned and will be using during the current Coronavirus crisis. https://t.co/gSvOWd934R

I am sitting at my desk in Washington waiting. Waiting for @SpeakerPelosi  to put a useful piece of legislation on the floor to help American workers and families impacted by the Coronavirus.  https://t.co/WqrC14GyIN
Rep. Van Drew reacts to Trump's coronavirus address https://t.co/B0ensASVzO
Please take a moment to read about some measures you can take to help prevent the spread of Coronavirus. https://t.co/wZFUUuYvxK
